title: Goodbye Thibs and Hello Hoiberg (?!) | Heat Check (Ep. 364)
description:
Minnesota firing Tom Thibodeau after a win, who could replace him, Kawhi Leonard’s return to San Antonio, and the drama-filled Sixers.
Host: John Gonzalez
Guests: Shea Serrano and Jonathan Tjarks
